message.content:
Here's a sample healthy meal plan for you with three balanced meals and two snacks in between:

Breakfast:
- 1 cup of cooked oats (with milk or almond milk)
- 1/2 banana sliced on top
- 1 tablespoon of peanut butter spread over the oats and banana
- 1/4 cup of chopped mixed berries

Snack:
- 1 medium apple with a tablespoon of natural peanut butter

Lunch:
- 1 whole wheat pita bread
- 2 cups of cooked brown rice (with some vegetables like broccoli or carrots)
- 1/4 cup of black beans
- 1/3 cup of sliced avocado
- 1 tablespoon of olive oil for dressing the salad

Snack:
- 2 cups of plain greek yogurt with a sprinkle of granola and some fresh berries on top

Dinner:
- 4 ounces of grilled chicken breast (with lemon juice for dressing)
- 1/3 cup of cooked brown rice
- 1/2 cup of steamed broccoli florets with a drizzle of olive oil and some freshly ground black pepper

Snack:
- 1 small handful of raw almonds or walnuts (with a sprinkle of sea salt)

This meal plan provides you with a good mix of carbohydrates, proteins and healthy fats. It also includes plenty of vegetables to keep your body well-nourished and help prevent chronic diseases like heart disease and cancer.
